titleStmt.title: Godly meditations made in the forme of prayers by S. Augustine
De meditatione. English.
titleStmt.author: Augustine, Saint, Bishop of Hippo.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Daye, dwelling ouer Aldersgate beneath S. Martyns,

notesStmt.note: Probably not in fact by Augustine.
Imprint from colophon; publication date estimated by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
